page.title: 17 ******SOCIAL CONCERNS****
page.content: { LINK { { { }Link was started 14 years ago in 1971. A committee of people from the village are elected to operate the scheme. Its purpose is to help people who encounter difficulties in their day to day lives.They act as'good neighbours' by arranging transport for medical visits or collecting prescription items from a chemist etc. Village people are asked every few years if they will volunteer to help run this village service on a rota duty basis. Appointed Area Wardens receive requests for help from needy villagers ;they then approach a volunteer to lend help in an appropriate way.
